alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Clinch; Echols; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Southern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 7:52PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Echols, southwestern Brantley, southern Ware, southeastern Clinch and northern Charlton Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 752 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fargo, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Fargo, Stephen Foster State Park, Homeland, Race Pond and Needmore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Brantley; Clinch; Echols; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Southern Ware; Western Charlton
